story.title: Our Story
content: Thomas TileWorks was founded with a simple mission: deliver high-quality tile craftsmanship and remodel work that East Tennessee homeowners and businesses can trust.

What started as a hands-on commitment to clean installation and dependable service has grown into a trusted local company serving Vonore, Maryville, Knoxville, Loudon, Madisonville, and Tellico Village.

We primarily focus on bathroom remodels and kitchen remodels, while also providing custom showers, maintenance services, and select specialty projects. Every job is completed with attention to detail, clear communication, and pride in the final result.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: We're committed to excellence in every aspect of our tile installation and remodeling services

items.title: Licensed & Insured
items.description: Fully licensed professionals with comprehensive insurance coverage for complete peace of mind on every project.

items.title: Reliable Service
items.description: Punctual, professional service with clear timelines and consistent communication from estimate to final walkthrough.

items.title: Satisfaction Guarantee
items.description: We stand behind our craftsmanship and work hard to make sure every client is confident in the final result.

items.title: Community Focused
items.description: Locally owned and deeply rooted in the East Tennessee community. We're invested in your satisfaction and in serving our neighbors with excellence.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Tile and remodeling professionals dedicated to serving the East Tennessee community
